translations: n．切口（复数）：在物体表面上的切割或刻痕。
· The carpenter made several kerfs in the wood.
木匠在木头上刻了几个切口。

sentences.sentence: The dicing kerfs have been reduced to below 20 um in many cases, with no chipping on either front or backside.
sentences.translation: 在很多情况下，刻划宽度可以小到20um，上下都没有碎屑。

sentences.sentence: Phenomenon of erosion delay in forming kerfs by abrasive waterjet will cause kerf incline in straight cutting or kerf taper in circular cutting process.
sentences.translation: 磨料水射流加工在切口形成过程中出现冲蚀延时现象，从而在直线切割时形成切口斜度，在圆形零件切割时形成切口锥度。
